unittitle_ssm: Reuben Fenner habeas corpus writ and affidavit
abstract_ssm: This collection consists of an 1814 writ of habeas corpus and affidavit addressed to Lieutenant Colonel Forbes, commander of the 42nd Regiment of the New York State Militia at Fort Lewis in New Utrecht, Kings County, regarding the release of Reuben Fenner, who enlisted under age.
corpname_ssm: New York (State). Militia. Regiment of Artillery, 42nd
